Package possportstore

Class Product

java.lang.Object
possportstore.Product
Direct Known Subclasses:
Accessories, Clothe, Shoe
public class Product extends Object
Represents a generic product in the inventory.

This class serves as the base entity for specific product categories such as Shoe, Clothe, and Accessories.

  • Constructor Details

    • Product

      public Product()
      Default constructor. Initializes a product with placeholder values.

    • Product

      public Product(String idProduct, String name, double price, int stock, String description)
      Constructs a new Product with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      idProduct - The unique identifier for the product.
      name - The display name of the product.
      price - The unit price of the product.
      stock - The initial quantity in stock.
      description - A brief description of the product.

  • Method Details

    • reduceStock

      public void reduceStock(int quantity)
      Reduces the stock of the product by a specified quantity.

      This method is typically called after a sale is finalized.

      Parameters:
      quantity - The amount of units to subtract from the stock.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the resulting stock would be negative.

    • increaseStock

      public void increaseStock(int quantity)
      Increases the stock of the product.

      This method is used when processing returns or restocking.

      Parameters:
      quantity - The amount to add back to stock.

    • getIdProduct

      public String getIdProduct()
      Gets the unique product ID.
      Returns:
      The product ID string.

    • setIdProduct

      public void setIdProduct(String idProduct)
      Sets the unique product ID.
      Parameters:
      idProduct - The new ID string.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the product name.
      Returns:
      The name of the product.

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the product name.
      Parameters:
      name - The new name.

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice()
      Gets the unit price.
      Returns:
      The price as a double.

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice(double price)
      Sets the unit price.
      Parameters:
      price - The new price.

    • getStock

      public int getStock()
      Gets the current stock quantity.
      Returns:
      The number of units in stock.

    • setStock

      public void setStock(int stock)
      Sets the stock quantity.
      Parameters:
      stock - The new stock level.

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Gets the product description.
      Returns:

    • setDescription

      Sets the product description.
      Parameters:
      description - The new description text.
